short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your Notion experience a little bit better with some QOL including colored headings, folded sidebar buttons and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a group of options that aim to improve your experience with the Notion website. These include:

+ ‚≠ê Automatically highlighting every heading across all your Notions.
+ üî• Having more vertical space in the sidebar by folding the "Search", "Inbox", and "Settings" buttons into horizontally lined icons (the notification counter also works).
+ Additional headings indication by adding # symbol at the end of it.
+ More horizontal space for your database board view.
+ Slightly more vertical space on page by reduced margin above it icon/name.

Every option can be disabled, if you want.
I will continue adding more features over time. 
Hope you like it! ‚ô•
